verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H271>Ahaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3147>Jotham<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, that <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and <S%H6492>Pekah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, went <S%H5927>up<s%> toward <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>war<s%> against <S%H3201>it<s%>, but could not prevail against <S%H3898>it<s%>.

And <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H8104>him<s%>, Take care, and be <S%H8252>quiet<s%>; <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H7401>not<s%>, neither be fainthearted for the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2180>tails<s%> of these <S%H6226>smoking<s%> <S%H181>firebrands<s%>, for the <S%H2750>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> with <S%H758>Syria<s%>, and of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%>.
Because <S%H758>Syria<s%>, <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%>, have taken <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3289>counsel<s%> against <S%H559>you<s%>, saying,

Let us go <S%H5927>up<s%> against <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H6973>trouble<s%> <S%H1234>it<s%>, and let us make a breach in it for <S%H4427>us<s%>, and set a <S%H4428>king<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H1121>it<s%>, even the son of <S%H2870>Tabeal<s%>:
<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%>, It shall not <S%H6965>stand<s%>, neither shall it come to pass.

For the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H758>Syria<s%> is <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>, and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> is <S%H7526>Rezin<s%>; and inside <S%H8346>sixty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> shall <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> be <S%H2865>broken<s%>, that it be not a <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> is <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%>. If you will not <S%H539>believe<s%>, surely you shall not be <S%H539>established<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> unto <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H7592>Ask<s%> you a <S%H226>sign<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; <S%H7592>ask<s%> it either in the <S%H6009>depth<s%>, or in the <S%H1361>height<s%> <S%H4605>above<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you <S%H1004>now<s%>, O house of <S%H1732>David<s%>; Is it a small <S%H4592>thing<s%> for you to <S%H3811>weary<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, but will you <S%H3811>weary<s%> my God <S%H430>also<s%>?

Therefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> himself shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you a <S%H226>sign<s%>; <S%H5959>Behold<s%>, a virgin shall <S%H2030>conceive<s%>, and <S%H3205>carry<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and shall <S%H7121>call<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H6005>Immanuel<s%>.
<S%H2529>Butter<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%> shall he <S%H398>eat<s%>, that he may <S%H3045>know<s%> to <S%H3988>refuse<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%>.

For before the <S%H5288>child<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> to <S%H3988>refuse<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%>, and <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%>, the <S%H127>land<s%> that you <S%H6973>abhor<s%> shall <S%H6440>be<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> of <S%H8147>both<s%> her <S%H4428>kings<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> upon <S%H5971>you<s%>, and upon your people, and upon your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H3117>days<s%> that have not <S%H935>come<s%>, from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; even the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H8319>hiss<s%> for the <S%H2070>fly<s%> that is in the outermost <S%H7097>part<s%> of the <S%H2975>rivers<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and for the <S%H1682>bee<s%> that is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

In the same <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H1548>shave<s%> with a <S%H8593>razor<s%> that is <S%H7917>hired<s%>, <S%H5676>namely<s%>, by them beyond the <S%H5104>river<s%>, by the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, the <S%H7218>head<s%>, and the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of the <S%H7272>feet<s%>: and it shall also <S%H5595>consume<s%> the <S%H2206>beard<s%>.
And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2421>nourish<s%> a <S%H1241>young<s%> <S%H5697>cow<s%>, and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>;

And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that every <S%H4725>place<s%> shall <S%H505>be<s%>, where there were a thousand <S%H1612>vines<s%> at a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H3701>silvers<s%>, it shall even be for <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns<s%>.
